class rpw.wrappers.Selection¶

Revit uidoc.Selection Wrapper Makes easier to manipulate Active Selection.

Usage:

selection = Selection() selection.element_ids selection.elements len(selection)

selection.RevitProperty selection.RevitMethod()

element_ids¶

returns: List of ElementIds Objects

elements¶

returns: List of Elements
